import { Grid, Dropdown } from 'semantic-ui-react' import React, { useState } from 'react'; function SignUpForm () { const initialData = { gym: '', tier: '', name: '', phone: '', email: '' } const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialData) const sampleArr = [ { key: "Tier 1", text: "Tier 1", value: "Tier 1" }, { key: "Tier 2", text: "Tier 2", value: "Tier 2" }] return (
) } export default SignUpForm;
